locations.name: Anchorage
locations.description: Alaska's largest city and the tour's starting point, often serving as the initial overnight location and transportation hub.

locations.name: Denali National Park Area
locations.description: The area adjacent to Denali National Park where lodges are typically located, serving as a base for park exploration, wildlife viewing, and seeing Denali.

locations.name: Seward
locations.description: A key port town on the Kenai Peninsula, acting as the primary gateway for cruises into Kenai Fjords National Park and offering access to coastal Alaskan scenery and marine wildlife.
